articles.title: London fashion week pays tribute to Queen as Monday’s parties banned - The Guardian
articles.description: While big brands cancel shows, the disruption has a massive knock-on effect on smaller designers
articles.content:
London fashion week began with a minutes silence in tribute to Queen Elizabeth II at the Daniel W Fletcher show before a model in a black morning suit and matching armband took to the runway.
